A morning person, but only if you mean “it’s still night”

fields.name: Quote:
fields.value: Crichton: “Hey, D’Argo, how come I’m not afraid?” D’Argo: “Fear accompanies the possibility of death. Calm shepherds its certainty.”  Crichton: “I love hangin’ with you, man.”

fields.name: Quote:
fields.value: “Jeremy Bearimy baby, we’ll get through this” - Chidi Anagonye “The Good Place - ‘Pandemonium’”

fields.name: Quote:
fields.value: Some prices are just too high, no matter how much you may want the prize. The one thing you can't trade for your heart's desire is your heart.  -  Lois McMaster Bujold
